message: I'm playing it and having fun.  It has a single player campaign, PVP maps and PVE maps for four players to coop vs AI waves.  It's not like the next best thing, or anything.  But for $15 it's pretty strong, and I'm having fun with it.  If anyone grabs it on Steam, let me know.  I'd love to coop with some guys here.

Section 8: Prejudice, $15 on Steam, PSN and XBL (I think).  I grabbed it on Steam.  It's a little FPS on the Unreal Engine.  It's kinda fun.  It feels like Tribes.  I'd say it's Halo+COD with the guts of Tribes.
Oh, it's PC only on Steam.
(except bioware. they get a free pass because I'm full of shit.)
I will not reward any game company who doesn't deploy their shit for the mac.
i mean, I can totally reboot to play it but...  well... I've become spoiled and I don't want to.
I'm kinda there too, lee. I hate to reboot.  It literally takes like 20 seconds, but it feels like such a chore.  Odd how that works out.
i got it on steam for $10. For that price, easy buy. I'm up for coop whenever. If you see me on steam, just send a message
Macs have turned you both into sloths!
I'd offer that I was a sloth well before I bought a Mac, lol
I just had a bitch of a time with windows. It felt good to destroy my boot camp partition.
I know I'll just have to reinstall when SW:TOR comes around, but still.
You know, I saw "Section 8" and the first thing that came to mind was government assisted housing.
